definitions.definition: To move about rapidly and nimbly .
To move quickly from one location to another.
To unpredictably change state for short periods of time.
examples: My blender flits because the power cord is damaged.

definitions.definition: To move house (sometimes a sudden move to avoid debts).
To move a tethered animal to a new grazing location.
To be unstable; to be easily or often moved.

main_definition: To move about rapidly and nimbly .
secondary_definitions: To move quickly from one location to another.
( physics ) To unpredictably change state for short periods of time.
( UK , dialect ) To move house (sometimes a sudden move to avoid debts).
To move a tethered animal to a new grazing location.
To be unstable; to be easily or often moved.
